frontmatter.title: Chapter 1: Getting started
frontmatter.description: This chapter will teach you about many cool things and introduce you to the most important concepts of the course.

frontmatter.title: Chapter 2: R Programming Basics
frontmatter.description: In R Programming Basics, you will master the basic operations of this popular open source language. You will also learn to perform simple algebraic operations on vectors and matrices, as well as other data structures such as factors, lists, and data frames. You will also learn about conditional statements, loops, and functions to power your R code, making your work more efficient and elegant.

frontmatter.title: Chapter 6: Data Wrangling
frontmatter.description: In this chapter, you will learn to use tidyr and dplyr from the tidyverse in R.

frontmatter.title: Chapter 7: Data Visualisation with R
frontmatter.description: This chapter will give you an introduction to the R graphics system and teach you how to get started with using the `ggplot2` package for drawing all kind of plots.
